data.text: @LeosAnimalPlan1 @PeterEgan6 Please retweet @PeterEgan6 and maybe you could give it another shout out @ChrisGPackham and @DeborahMeaden.  We only have 10 days and still need 16,000 signatures.  In these terrible times this is one petition we can try and push through!  Thank you!

@LeosAnimalPlan1 @PeterEgan6 Please retweet @PeterEgan6 Leo is asking so nicely, to retweet this Petition #StopTheGrind save the #whales and #Dolphins in the #feroeislands how can you say no to such a precious animal loving advocate .🙋‍♂️ ❤️🙏💙🐋🐬🐶🐕🐯🦁🐅🐆
@LeosAnimalPlan1 Your smile spreads happiness around, Leo 👋 Stay blessed, and keep spreading happiness and positivity! 🌿🦔🍃🐿️🦜🪶🦉🌾🌾
